content:
# Factorio Agent Report (Updated)

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power generation facility at x=-9.5 to x=-2.5
Consists of:
- Offshore pump (x=-9.5, y=-0.5) - working, producing water
- Boiler (x=-6.5, y=0.0) - now fueled with coal (21 remaining), producing steam
- Steam engine (x=-2.5, y=0.5) - working, connected to power network
- Pipe network (system 1125/1126) connecting all components

### Oil production facility at x=17.5 to x=37.5
Consists of:
- Pumpjack (x=17.5, y=40.5) - working, producing crude oil
- Oil refinery (x=27.5, y=40.5) - powered, set to BasicOilProcessing but showing FLUID_INGREDIENT_SHORTAGE
- Storage tank (x=32.5, y=40.5) - empty, not receiving petroleum gas
- Chemical plant (x=37.5, y=40.5) - powered, set to PlasticBar recipe but showing FLUID_INGREDIENT_SHORTAGE
- Wooden chest with coal (x=37.5, y=37.5) - contains 146 coal
- Inserter (x=37.5, y=38.5) - now powered but output blocked
- Disconnected pipe networks at multiple positions (x=18.5,28.5,29.5,31.5 y=38.5,43.5,37.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Fluid connection failures
- Repeated attempts to connect empty storage tank to chemical plant:
  - Verify refinery is producing petroleum gas before connecting storage tank
  - Check pipe connections between refinery and storage tank first
  - Ensure all intermediate pipes are properly connected in sequence

### Pipe system issues
- Multiple disconnected pipe groups in oil facility:
  - Connect pumpjack to refinery first (x=18.5 to x=28.5)
  - Then connect refinery output to storage tank (x=29.5 to x=31.5)
  - Finally connect storage tank to chemical plant (x=31.5 to x=38.5)

### Inserter operation problems
- Inserter at x=37.5 y=38.5 still shows "output blocked":
  - Clear any items at drop position (x=37.5 y=39.5)
  - Verify chemical plant can accept items at this position

### Previous errors still applicable:
- Power connection issues (verify all connections)
- Fluid system verification (check all connections sequentially)
- Production monitoring (verify refinery output before connecting downstream)
- Entity inspection (check fluid contents before connection attempts)
